ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Samsung NX2000 Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera Body & 20-50mm Lens (White) + <2> Transcend 32GB microSDHC Card + <3> PD Mini Sling Backpack +
<4> Sunpak 40.5mm UV Glass Filter + <5> Battery for Samsung + <6> Sunpak 1000XL Compact Tripod +
<7> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <8> Xit SD/SDHC MicroSD Reader + <9> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> .45x Wide & 2.5x Tele Lens + <12> Image Recovery Software
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung NX2000 Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera Body & 20-50mm Lens (White) with 32GB Card + Backpack + Battery + Tripod + Tele/Wide Lenses + Filter + Accessory Kit
